text: Bettendorf is a city in Iowa in the United States. It is in Scott County. Bettendorf is not one of the Quad Cities, however neighboring Davenport and the Illinois cities of Moline, East Moline and Rock Island are. In 2011, Bettendorf was named America's 95th Best Town by CNNMoney. ==References== Category:Cities in Iowa
title: Bettendorf, Iowa
